attributes.action: Protect services at Ilkeston Community Hospital and Minor Injuries Unit
attributes.background: Cuts to Ilkeston Community Hospital or the Minor Injuries Unit should be ruled out. Making significant changes to local NHS services including reducing hospital beds, closing wards or reducing opening hours without consulting the local community is wrong.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for. 

This decision appears to have been made by the Erewash Clinical Commissioning Group. You can find out how to contact them here: 

http://www.erewashccg.nhs.uk/contact-us/

You can find more information about how to make a complaint here: 

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/health/nhs-and-social-care-complaints/complaining-about-the-nhs/who-you-can-go-to-when-you-have-a-problem-with-the-nhs/complaining-to-a-clinical-commissioning-group-about-services-they-commissioned/
